# The `AssignmentInfo` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Describes properties of a store that has a static size and offset into a some base storage. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Describes properties of a store that has a static size and offset into a some base storage.

Used by the getAssignmentInfo functions.

Definition at line 338 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfo-h">DebugInfo.h</a>.
